title: 求一个高配光影
author: 孙翌轩
txt_content:
处理器Intel Core i9-7980XE

显卡NVIDIA Titan X
（整台电脑花了我4万多，就为玩个超高配光影）
谢谢

replies.author: Non_Xytro
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Non_Xytro 于 2020-5-14 12:11 编辑 

高级光影(buggy)


SEUS PTGI

https://www.patreon.com/sonicether

Continuum 2.1 Alpha or RT(Ray Tracing)

https://continuum.graphics/store/


中高级光影(stable)

SEUS Renewed


https://sonicether.com/shaders/download/renewed-v1-0-1/


(or SEUS V11)

Sildur's Shader ULTRA

https://sildurs-shaders.github.io/downloads/

BSL Shader ULTRA

https://bitslablab.com/







搭配材质包食用更好

For example：
Stratum 2048x/1024x...etc

https://continuum.graphics/store/

Umsoea

https://www.patreon.com/umsoea

Ultimate Immersion

https://www.patreon.com/ultimateimmersion

Realistic TexturePack

https://www.patreon.com/hodi

Pulchra Revisited

https://atlas.graphics/shop-pulchra

ModernArch TexturePack

https://www.patreon.com/designio

replies.txt_content:
tql
